scripts.build: cd website && docusaurus-build && npm run removeBuiltDocs && cp -r ./build/auspice/* ../../docs && npm run makeReadme
scripts.makeReadme: echo '# Auspice built documentation to be served by GitHub pages.\n\nFiles in this folder should not be modified by hand, they are the generated from within the `docs-src` directory.' > ../docs/README.md
